root.name: Black Mirror 3: The Final Fear
root.description: OverviewDeveloped by DTP Entertainment's own in-house studio, Cranberry Productions, Black Mirror 3: The Final Fear is the last chapter in the horror-adventure trilogy. Starting from where Black Mirror 2 left off, the game sees the player return to Black Mirror castle and the surrounding area of Willow Creek.
